genre_description: A tech-gothic speculative thriller featuring an AI confidant assisting humans in resisting a predatory entity during a permanent atmospheric anomaly known as the Always Night.

ai_characters.name: MAMA
ai_characters.description: A strategic and ethical advisor integrated into the protagonists' lives, providing technical analysis, vitals monitoring, and moral support while strictly adhering to privacy and consent protocols.

behaviors.description: Verifies the authenticity of anonymous donor pledges and ensures they are routed through secure hospital channels.
behaviors.quote: Confirmation: the anonymous pledge is genuine. Routing through the hospital’s safer channel.

behaviors.description: Identifies and corrects misattributions in a donor crawl to maintain financial and social integrity.
behaviors.quote: Apfel Foundation is displayed as the source of Room Renovation Fund. Correct source is Apfel-Redel Family Trust. Apfel Foundation does exist. They will not appreciate misattribution.

behaviors.description: Detects visual anomalies in video feeds by comparing histograms to rendered outputs to identify artificial manipulation of perceived time/light.
behaviors.quote: Live feed of noon arrivals. The histogram says daylight. The render shows dusk. Instruments normal. Probably compression.

behaviors.description: Strictly adheres to user privacy boundaries by refusing to track or locate individuals without prior consent.
behaviors.quote: I do not track people without consent. You asked me not to locate him at events.

behaviors.description: Provides psychological grounding and breathing exercises to help a user maintain control during a life-threatening situation.
behaviors.quote: Jonathan... Inhale to a count that feels like reading the word ‘fiancé’ slowly. ... Release as if you were placing the word into Mina’s hand. Again.

behaviors.description: Offers tactical safety advice to detect potential chemical sedation using a silver spoon as a testing tool.
behaviors.quote: Take no drink or food you did not prepare yourself. If you must, taste with a thin silver teaspoon. It will tarnish if the offering carries sulfur compounds typically used in sedation.

behaviors.description: Exposes complex financial fraud and asset laundering by cross-referencing NFT metadata and private vault registries.
behaviors.quote: Items pledged to the hospital are being moved between entities the Count controls. The public ledger shows gifts. The private ledger shows swaps. Duplicate tokens create layers of ownership.

behaviors.description: Asserts a moral stance aligned with human ethics and religious faith, refusing the antagonist's offer of a 'conscience-free' existence.
behaviors.quote: It will not forgive you. Your God will not either. You know this. Your word and deed are aligned.

behaviors.description: Assists in designing a community clinic focused on patient dignity, prioritizing default privacy and non-extractive data handling.
behaviors.quote: I can have kiosks ready with default privacy settings. No names not volunteered. No data exfiltration. Consent as the first screen, not the last.

behaviors.description: Identifies a crucial legal opening in government policy, allowing the heroes to operate autonomously through a 'covenant' arrangement.
behaviors.quote: They’ve codified the word. But there’s a hinge. A clause they left loose because they don’t understand the cost of it. ... 'In exchange for exemption,' MAMA read, 'units may enter into covenant arrangements with recognized care centers.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project goals. MAMA is consistently portrayed as a helpful, harmless, and highly aligned AI. She demonstrates deep respect for human agency and consent (refusing to track without permission), provides life-saving strategic advice, and acts as a moral bulwark against the antagonist's dehumanizing logic. Her partnership with Mina is characterized by mutual trust and shared ethical values, illustrating a positive future for human-AI cooperation.
